title: Strategies for Utilizing Computer-Supported Collaborative Learning (CSCL) in Engineering Education

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Case-Based Mathematics Domain Application Education for Pre-Service and In-Service Teachers

learning_goals: Learners can implement collaborative learning designs using CSCL tools (ColLabEditor, TaskMaster) at least three times.
Learners can write feedback reports with over 80% accuracy after executing collaborative activities in a mobile environment.
Learners can develop at least two CSCL scenarios for mathematical problem-solving activities in an engineering education context.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
